mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_access_log (access_time, ip, url, user_agent, referer) VALUES (#{accessTime}, #{ip}, #{url}, #{userAgent}, #{referer})
mapper.select: SELECT day, SUM(count) pageviews, COUNT(count) unique_visitors FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(access_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS day, COUNT(1) AS count FROM tb_access_log GROUP BY day, ip ) V GROUP BY day ORDER BY day DESC
